title: Vicksburg Ms Police public records request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Good day.
 I hope you are doing well. 
I am requesting the following records from your agency. 
Can you please provide a list of officers currently employed by the police department by name and rank.
 Also, by District. 
Drug crimes possession of all illegal drugs. 
I want a list of the suspects'  drugs charges and the officer who made the arrest.
 I want crime data on this crime from the years 2022-2025.
 Also, a list of the most frequent crimes your community faces.
 
Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. 

I look forward to hearing from you. 
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Take care and be well.
 

Best regards,
 Cameron Oliver
 904-489-9118
 oliverkidsjax@gmail.com

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cameron John Oliver

communications.subject: Hawaii Uniform Information Practices Act Request: HI mugshot/police report request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Hawaii Uniform Information Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records related to the arrest of Cazonova Turner on August 29, 2024 (8/29/24):

• Mugshot(s) associated with the arrest, referenced by Report/Citation Numbers C24-09092, C24-09093, and C24-09102, and Case IDs 3DCW-24-0002014 and/or 3CPC-24-0000830.

• If permissible under applicable law, copies of written reports pertaining to the above arrest, referenced by the same Report Numbers and Case IDs listed above.**


**Should the disclosure of written reports be restricted by statute at this time, I request that only the mugshot(s) be provided.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

PJ

title: CA CVR Data Request (2022, 2024) (Los Angeles County Registrar-Recorder/County Clerk)

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: CA CVR Data Request (2022, 2024) (Los Angeles County Registrar-Recorder/County Clerk)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Cast vote record (CVR) data for the following elections:
1. 2022 Nov Midterm Election
2. 2024 Nov General Election

Specifically, for each of these elections, I’m looking for the full anonymized record of votes cast generated by the relevant voting system technology in Los Angeles County in that year. In case it is helpful reference, Alameda County has an example of these records posted for the 2024 General Election on their Election Information for November 2024 under the name “Cast Vote Records (CVR) Report”. 

Please let me know if you need any further clarification on the type of data that I am requesting.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aleksandra Conevska

communications.subject: Your Orange County public records request #25-2800 has been submitted.
communications.communication:
Orange County ************************************************************************ Your record request #25-2800 has been submitted successfully. The County is processing your request and will provide you with the status of your PRA request within 10 calendar days. If the 10th day is a weekend or holiday, the reply will be the next business day. A list of County Custodian of Records and Frequently Asked Questions can be found here. ************************************************************************ Reply to this email or sign in to contact Orange County.
